contact.4:
Express your opinion, offer cooperation, report a bug or just write anything :)
Any feedback is welcome!

mobileDialog.1:
In order for the page to display correctly, it is necessary to enable the full screen mode
and turn on the device rotation.

emailDialog.1:
Thank you for your message.
I will try to get to you as soon as possible.
emailDialog.4: Unfortunately, there was an error sending your message.

projectsDialog.1:
Click on a tile to view the project.
Click on it one more time to zoom.
To dismiss, click outside of it.
To exit the project, click the button in the lower right corner of the screen.
Golden star means a commercial project.
White star means a non-commercial project.

browserMessage:
The browser for which the project was optimized is Firefox.
To view the website, please change your browser :)
